name: Vancouver Waterfront Park
description: A popular riverside area with walking paths, restaurants, and great views of the Columbia River.
imageAlt: View of the Vancouver Waterfront Park along the river.

name: Fort Vancouver
description: A historic site with reconstructed buildings, gardens, and exhibits about the early history of the area.
imageAlt: Historic buildings and grounds at Fort Vancouver.

name: Esther Short Park
description: One of the oldest public squares in the West, used for community events, markets, and concerts.
imageAlt: Clock tower and lawn at Esther Short Park.

name: Vancouver Farmers Market
description: A seasonal market offering local produce, crafts, food vendors, and live music.
imageAlt: Vendors and visitors at the Vancouver Farmers Market.

name: Columbia Tech Center Park
address: 17701 SE Mill Plain Blvd, Vancouver, WA 98683
description: A modern park with a large pond, walking paths, and seasonal events and concerts.
imageAlt: Pond and walking paths at Columbia Tech Center Park.

name: Vancouver Community Library
description: A large public library with study spaces, technology, and programs for all ages.
imageAlt: Exterior of the Vancouver Community Library building.

name: Wintler Community Park
description: A small sandy beach park on the Columbia River, popular for picnics and river views.
imageAlt: Sandy riverside area at Wintler Community Park.

name: Leverich Park
address: 4209 NE Leverich Park Way, Vancouver, WA 98663
description: A wooded park with walking paths, disc golf, and open green space for recreation.
imageAlt: Trees and open space at Leverich Park.
